description.@en: You are able to speak in your own tongue, despite taking upon a more savage form.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can retain the ability to speak, use reagents and cast Magick while transmogrified into the form of any animalâ€™s shape you take. This works in conjunction with aforementioned Magick under the Arcana of Animism that enables the caster to transform into various beast forms.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: With but a whisper, your voice is stricken from you. You cannot speak for 48 hours.

reagents.@en: The tongue of the creature you want to transform into (expended)
